channel.title: [317]How To Make A Message Pop-Up In Game
channel.description: Well, I am putting in a ::rules on my server that I am making. What do I have to do to get it to pop up on the screen, and not in the chat box?

item.title: [317]How To Make A Message Pop-Up In Game
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Well my problem was solved, and he is having problems, so why create another thread? =P

item.title: [317]How To Make A Message Pop-Up In Game
item.dc:creator: @djspanke djspanke
item.description:
@djspanke wrote:

sorry, but

[quote=“I Yaa I, post:13, topic:271466”][quote author=Pray for plagues link=topic=358221.msg2735417#msg2735417 date=1239031231]
Try this, it’s how I have on my server:

[code]if (command.startsWith("rules")) {
    sendQuest("@bla@Welcome To KinglesScape" + playerName + "!", 8147);
    sendQuest("@red@Please Follow These Rules!", 8148);
    sendQuest("@bla@Rule 1: No Spamming/Trolling!", 8149);
    sendQuest("@red@Rule 2: Respect All Staff Members! They Earned Their Spot!", 8150);
    sendQuest("@bla@Rule 3: No Advertising!", 8151);
    sendQuest("@red@Rule 4: No Pornographic Content!", 8152);
    sendQuest("@bla@Rule 5: Follow All Rules For Each Area!", 8153);
    sendQuest("@red@Thank You For Your Time! Have Fun!", 8154);
    sendQuest("@bla@~KinglesScape Staff~", 8155);
    sendQuestSomething(8143);
    showInterface(8134);
    flushOutStream();

}[/code]
[/quote]

When i used that and then it didnt work i deleted it and now i have 100 errors in my compiler[/quote]

make your own topic and koopa, this is your help, not for you to help people

Read full topic
item.source: [317]How To Make A Message Pop-Up In Game

item.title: [317]How To Make A Message Pop-Up In Game
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Yes. The numbers represent the different spots on the lines each sentence/word will be written on. If you had the same number for all of them, all of the words would over write each other. Good call Robin!

Read full topic

item.title: [317]How To Make A Message Pop-Up In Game
item.dc:creator: @Robintje1 Robintje1
item.description:
@Robintje1 wrote:

I’ve got it!
You forgot the numbers! * ==> number

else if (command.startsWith("rules")) { sendFrame126("@bla@Welcome To KinglesScape" + playerName + "! @dbl@", ****); sendFrame126("@red@Please Follow These Rules!", ****); sendFrame126("@bla@Rule 1: No Spamming/Trolling!", ****); sendFrame126("@red@Rule 2: Respect All Staff Members! They Earned Their Spot!", ****); sendFrame126("@bla@Rule 3: No Advertising!", ****); sendFrame126("@red@Rule 4: No Pornographic Content!", ****); sendFrame126("@bla@Rule 5: Follow All Rules For Each Area!", ****); sendFrame126("@red@Thank You For Your Time! Have Fun!", ****); sendFrame126("@bla@~KinglesScape Staff~", ****); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
Like this:

else if (command.startsWith("rules")) { sendFrame126("@bla@Welcome To KinglesScape" + playerName + "! @dbl@", 9991); sendFrame126("@red@Please Follow These Rules!", 9992); sendFrame126("@bla@Rule 1: No Spamming/Trolling!", 9993); sendFrame126("@red@Rule 2: Respect All Staff Members! They Earned Their Spot!", 9994); sendFrame126("@bla@Rule 3: No Advertising!", 9995); sendFrame126("@red@Rule 4: No Pornographic Content!", 9996); sendFrame126("@bla@Rule 5: Follow All Rules For Each Area!", 9997); sendFrame126("@red@Thank You For Your Time! Have Fun!", 9998); sendFrame126("@bla@~KinglesScape Staff~", 9999); }

Read full topic

item.title: [317]How To Make A Message Pop-Up In Game
item.dc:creator: @Robintje1 Robintje1
item.description:
@Robintje1 wrote:

Something like this:

[code]public void ServerHelp()
{
if(playerRights < 10){

			sendFrame126("@dre@Welcome "+playerName, 8144);  //Title
			clearQuestInterface();
			sendFrame126("@dre@Welcome to ******* ", 8145);
			sendFrame126("@blu@Owner: *****", 8145);
			sendFrame126("@blu@Please, don't missuse this game.", 8147);
			sendFrame126("@dre@Players online: "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 8149);
			sendQuestSomething(8143);
			showInterface(8134);
			flushOutStream();
                               }[/code]

But how to start it up, don’t know I… But I think…
Seek in client.java:

sendMessage("Welcome to

And after that set there: ServerHelp()
